com.yy.transvod.player

类 PlayerOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yy.transvod.player.PlayerOptions

  • public class PlayerOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    PlayerOptions used to configure the VodPlayer.

      • videoCodec

        public int videoCodec
        video codec, using MEDIA_SW_CODEC or MEDIA_HW_CODEC to decode. If the hard decoding mode is selected, but it is not supported internally, it will automatically switch to the soft decoding mode

      • audioCodec

        public int audioCodec
        audio codec, using MEDIA_SW_CODEC or MEDIA_HW_CODEC to decode.

      • videoSeekMode

        public int videoSeekMode
        Seek mode, using VIDEO_SEEK_MODE_NORMAL or VIDEO_SEEK_MODE_ACCURATE

      • clearRender

        public boolean clearRender

      • usingSurfaceView

        public boolean usingSurfaceView
        TextureView and SurfaceView both supported in player.

      • playerMode

        public int playerMode
        which biz mode of the player, PLAYER_FOR_VOD by default.

      • samplerFilter

        public int samplerFilter

      • forceUse601ColorStandard

        public boolean forceUse601ColorStandard
        解码时，是否强制使用 601 颜色矩阵。 当此选项为 false 时，内部硬解直接将解码的 rgb 解码到 SurfaceTexture，但控制不了使用 601 还是 709 颜色矩阵。 当此选项为 true 时，内部硬解将 yuv 结果解码到 Buffer, 再将 yuv 数据中使用 601 颜色矩阵来转换到 rgb。 这个选项是为了解决观看直播流的色偏问题。

      • directRenderToSurface

        public boolean directRenderToSurface
